arStrings.szText: Casting a Skill that {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c} reduces the cooldown of {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} by {c_number}[{SF_13}]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves behind a Corpse every {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} second.
You gain {c_important}[SF_19 * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} seconds after {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} ends.
